member.name: T:EnhancedPensionSystem_WebAPP.Controllers.BenefitEligibilitiesController
member.summary: Controller for managing benefit eligibility operations.

member.name: M:EnhancedPensionSystem_WebAPP.Controllers.BenefitEligibilitiesController.#ctor(EnhancedPensionSystem_Application.UnitOfWork.Abstraction.IServiceManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The service manager that provides access to the benefit eligibility service.

member.name: M:EnhancedPensionSystem_WebAPP.Controllers.BenefitEligibilitiesController.CheckMemberBenefitEligibilityAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a member is eligible for benefits.
member.param: The unique identifier of the member.
member.returns: Returns a response indicating whether the member is eligible for benefits.
member.response: Returns the eligibility status of the member.
If the request is invalid or the member ID is missing.
If the member is not found.

member.name: M:EnhancedPensionSystem_WebAPP.Controllers.BenefitEligibilitiesController.GetAllEligibleMembersAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all eligible members.
member.returns: A list of members who qualify for benefits.
member.response: Returns the list of eligible members.
If no eligible members are found.

member.summary: Adds a new contribution for a member.
member.param: The contribution details including member ID, amount, date, and type.
member.returns: Returns the status of the contribution addition.

member.summary: Retrieves a breakdown of a member's contributions.

member.returns: Returns a detailed breakdown of the member's contributions.

member.summary: Gets the total contributions made by a specific member.

member.returns: Returns the total contribution amount for the member.
member.response: No contributions found for the member.

member.name: M:EnhancedPensionSystem_WebAPP.Controllers.ContributionsController.GetAllContributionsAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all contributions.
member.returns: Returns all contributions available in the system.
